Ref: CXP072/2023

Criteria:

  • Grade 12 / Matric Certificate
  • Clear criminal and ITC credit record.
  • 3-5 years experience in a Sales Administrative role.
  • Experience in dealing directly with customers and / or customer service.
  • Proficient in new Microsoft 365 – MS Excel including Pivot tables, V-Lookup
  • Proficiency in SAP Business By Design (ByD) is a must.
  • Able to navigate new systems, reports and detailed excel data.
  • Valid driver’s license

Apply via website or alternatively, via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
